Service.Name: OGC:WMS
Service.Title: Simple Map Server V:0.713
Service.Abstract: SimpleMapServer is a java open source WMS map server; by Gilles Lavaux [GLavaux@serco.it]. See project page at: http://glmapserver.sourceforge.net/

Layer.Name: MGVIHornOfAfrica
Layer.Title: MERIS Global Vegetation Index Over Horn Of Africa
Layer.Abstract: The MERIS Global Vegetation Index (MGVI) is a good measure of the amount and vigour of vegetation at the surface and it is computed by "MERIS MGVI Regional" a GPOD (Grid Processing On Demand) service. The MGVI level-3 aggregation processor routinely operated on ESA Grid Processing on Demand (G-POD), is developed and maintained by the European Commission Joint Research Centre (JRC).

Layer.Name: HUMIDITY
Layer.Title: SWI (Soil Water Index) 1992-2001
Layer.Abstract: Soil Moisture 1992-2001 (scatterometer)

Layer.Name: EPIDEMIO_DUST_20040223
Layer.Title: Weekly Dust Map from the EPIDEMIO Project

Layer.Name: MEDSPID_DAILY
Layer.Title: Mediterranean Sea Surface Temperature
Layer.Abstract: Daily Mediterranean sea surface temperature. The data used are from the DUE/Medspiration project which is a real-time service for the production and delivery of high-resolution sea surface temperature from all available satellite sensors. The data cover the period from 2004-10-03 and is updated daily.

Layer.Name: EPIDEMIO_DUST_20040126
Layer.Title: Weekly Dust Map from the EPIDEMIO Project

Layer.Name: ATSR
Layer.Title: ATSR2 1km global mosaic (Apr 1999)
Layer.Abstract: ATSR2 1km global mosaic (Apr 1999) created inside the ESRIN/ESA WebMapping activities

Layer.Name: MEDSPID_GLOBAL_DAILY
Layer.Title: Global Sea Surface Temperature
Layer.Abstract: Global sea surface temperature. The data used are from the DUE/Medspiration project which is a real-time service for the production and delivery of high-resolution sea surface temperature from all available satellite sensors. The data cover the period from 2007-10-01 and is updated daily.

Layer.Name: GAL_MEDSPID_DAILY
Layer.Title: Galapagos sea surface temperature. The data used are from the DUE/Medspiration project which is a real-time service for the production and delivery of high-resolution sea surface temperature from all available satellite sensors. The data cover the period from 2007-02-22 and is updated daily

Layer.Name: DEM_30sec
Layer.Title: Digital Elevation Model (DEM)
Layer.Abstract: A global view of the ACE-DEM. Height information is a combination of unaltered existing DEMs, altimeter-derived data and RA-refined DEMs
